cybernetics.name: Optical bioscanner
cybernetics.description: You gain access to the precise hit point, armor, and dodge values of biological creatures.
cybernetics.flavorText: A miniscule graphene array that processes optical data against a repository of organic lifeforms.

cybernetics.name: Optical technoscanner
cybernetics.description: You gain access to the precise hit point, armor, and dodge values of robotic creatures and you automatically identify artifacts.
cybernetics.flavorText: A miniscule graphene array that processes optical data against a repository of robotic lifeforms and artifacts.

cybernetics.name: Dermal insulation
cybernetics.description:
+6 Heat Resistance
+6 Cold Resistance
+6 Electrical Resistance
+6 Acid Resistance
cybernetics.flavorText: Pillowy fiberglass scales tense around a supporting axis. Once installed, they'll unwind and inflate under the skin.

cybernetics.name: Night vision
cybernetics.description: You gain the toggleable ability to see in the dark.
cybernetics.flavorText: Nerve-packed retina scatters incoming radiation and bends light so the irises turn jade.

cybernetics.name: Hyper-elastic ankle tendons
cybernetics.flavorText: Banded ropes of hydrogel are bundled into one.

cybernetics.name: Parabolic muscular subroutine
cybernetics.description:
Your throw range is increased by 2.
When you throw something at a target inside your throw range, your throwing accuracy is 100%.
cybernetics.flavorText: Nerve bundles so arranged to stimulate muscles in the arm along a parabolic slide rule.

cybernetics.name: Translucent skin
cybernetics.flavorText: The diaphanous dermis throws the circulatory, muscular, and nervous networks into silhouetted relief.

cybernetics.name: Stabilizer arm locks
cybernetics.description: For the purposes of determining your accuracy with ranged attacks, your agility is treated as if it were 6 points higher.
cybernetics.flavorText: Chrome clasps fasten arm joints to emulate the stillness of unlife.

cybernetics.name: Rapid release finger flexors
cybernetics.flavorText: Neuronically charged tissue sheaths transmit the will faster than what cell biology had achieved.

cybernetics.name: Carbide hand bones
cybernetics.flavorText: Blue carbide merely dents where weak collagen would be smashed to bits.

cybernetics.name: Pentaceps
cybernetics.description: Your Charge range is increased by 4 spaces.
cybernetics.flavorText: The quartet of knee joint extensors gain the assistance of a synthetic fifth.

cybernetics.name: Inflatable axons
cybernetics.description:
Activated. Cooldown 100.
You gain +40 quickness for 10 rounds, then you become sluggish for 10 rounds (-10 quickness).
cybernetics.flavorText: Nanoscopic stents inflate the gossamer brain-threads that restrict the conduction of the will.

cybernetics.name: Air current microsensor
cybernetics.description: Staircases and other up/down map transitions are always revealed to you.
cybernetics.flavorText: Near the Fuming God Sea, where seawater crashes into sunrock and erupts into mephitic vapor, a labyrinth of volcanic grottos form a dimensionless space where the utility of sight wanes. For the children of the deep, new senses wax in its stead.

cybernetics.name: Cherubic visage
cybernetics.flavorText: Carnal instructions dictate the reformation of the face's bone structure and plump tissue mass into a soft and angelic countenance. Through such thaumaturgy, the people of hoary Ibul, cradled in the breast of a collapsed ice shelf, wander its lamplighted streets in rosy-cheeked disinterest.

cybernetics.name: Nocturnal apex
cybernetics.description:
+10% to natural healing rate during the day.
Once per night, you can Prowl, gaining +6 Agility and +10 movespeed for 100 rounds.
cybernetics.flavorText: The metabolic rhythms of the Holy City's denizens are synchronized to their diurnal rituals: during the day, repose in prayer beneath the shade of a fluted ziggurat; during the night, prowl the toxic arboreta for sacrifices.
